title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description: Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so on the first try.
EB: The item can only be selected on the second attempt.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view
2. Try to select any item
3. Observe that the item cannot be selected on the first attempt
4. Try to select the same item again
5. Observe that the item can now be selected.
